title: Hand of Sauron (3C90)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a [Sauron] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.
Lore:	”'The power of the Ring could not be undone.'”
Rarity:	C
